title: Delhi–Fazilka Intercity Express
text:
The 14731 / 32 Delhi Junction - Fazilka Intercity Express is an <a href="Superfast%20Express%20trains%20in%20India">express</a> train belonging to <a href="Indian%20Railways">Indian Railways</a> <a href="North%20Western%20Railway%20zone">North Western Railway zone</a> that runs between and in <a href="India">India</a>.
It operates as train number 14731 from to and as train number 14732 in the reverse direction serving the states of <a href="Haryana">Haryana</a>, <a href="Punjab%2C%20India">Punjab</a> & <a href="Delhi">Delhi</a>.
Coaches.
The 14731 / 32 Delhi Junction – Fazilka Intercity Express has one AC 3 Tier, one AC Chair Car, four chair car, seven general unreserved & two SLR (seating with luggage rake) coaches. It does not carry a <a href="Dining%20car">pantry car coach</a>.
As is customary with most train services in India, coach composition may be amended at the discretion of Indian Railways depending on demand.
Service.
The 14731 – Intercity Express covers the distance of in 10 hours 35 mins (49 km/hr) & in 10 hours 45 mins as the 14732 – Intercity Express (49 km/hr).
As the average speed of the train is less than , as per railway rules, its fare doesn't includes a Superfast surcharge.
Routing.
The 14731 / 32 Delhi Junction – Fazilka Intercity Express runs from via , , , , to .
Traction.
As the route is going to be electrified, a based <a href="Indian%20locomotive%20class%20WDM-3A">WDM-3A</a> diesel locomotive pulls the train to its destination.
